data.body: console flickers and spams messages constantly after task is completed.  related to 31f it should just flicker the tab section at the top of the console, flickering dark/light green for 5 seconds and then simply close the tab and be certain to terminate the process.

data.title: console gets caught in infinite loop after task is finished
